title: Topdown Local Co-op Tank Shooter
description: A topdown tank shooting game that supports 4 player local co-op made with blueprints.
longDescription: Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=TYxnLt6xqos&feature=youtu.be A topdown tank shooting game that supports 4 player local co-op made with blueprints. Features: • Simple enemy movement/shooting blueprints • Enemy random targeting blueprint designed for multi-player • 4 different weapon blueprints with 2 upgrades each • Wave mode level to play with • 9 different enemies • Weapon changing/upgrade blueprints • Camera designed for local multi-player • 4 characters to play with in local co-op • speed/boost blueprint • tested for PC with game pads only • enemy spawning blueprint for wave mode
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints:66
List of Features:
• Enemy AI movement Blueprints 
• Enemy targeting blueprints designed for multiplayer
• Enemy Shooting Blueprints designed for multiplayer
• Enemy Chase blueprints designed for multiplayer
• Local Multiplayer with gamepads (1-4)
• Local Multiplayer Camera Blueprint
• Wave mode with 6 action packed waves to get you started
• 4 different weapons for the players (Mini gun, Shotgun Spread, Laser Beam, Piercing long shot)
• 3 levels of upgrade for each of the 4 weapons, each more powerful and looks cooler!
• Weapon + health pick up & upgrade pick up blueprints for players
• Twin stick tank movements, left stick moves & rotates bottom and right stick rotates turret. (also works with keyboard, WASD moves & rotates bottom while Mouse pointer rotates turret to aim)
• Pick up drop chance (%) blueprint from enemy blueprint. 
Engine Compatibility: 4.10
Intended Platform:Windows, Mac 
Platforms Tested: Windows

Additional Notes: Easy to learn with very simple blueprints including simple AI and character/player blueprints. Perfect for beginners! Tested with 4 Game pads with 3 other people. Best played with game pad.
